archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0139
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want interest free decisioning to provide an automated yes/maybe/no answer, so that my process doesn’t require human intervention if I'm a yes or a no. (NB: 'Maybe' needs to go to queue for manual assessment)

properties.value: What should be presented for customer in case of "Maybe" Show customer a message that he needs to wait for some more checks. "Maybe" could be in case of exeeding the defined amount of devices etc (internal checks) even if external credit check is ok. Parked for additional session

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
